centralauth-desc: [[Special:MergeAccount|Aontaich cunntasan]] air fheadh nan uicidhean aig {{int:Centralauth-groupname}}
centralauth-antispoof-desc: Cuiridh seo teicneolas AntiSpoof ri CentralAuth
centralauth-rename-desc: Cuiridh seo teicneolas Renameuser ri CentralAuth
centralauth-mergeaccount-desc: [[Special:MergeAccount|Aontaichidh seo iomadh cunntas]] airson logadh a-steach leis an aon chunntas
centralauth-merge-denied: Duilich ach chan eil cead agad gus an duilleag seo inntrigeadh.
centralauth-merge-notlogged: [$1 Logh a-steach] gus sùil a thoirt an deach na cunntasan agad aontachadh gu slàn.
centralauth-merge-step1-title: Tòisich air aontachadh an logaidh a-steach
